title: Tall, Dark, Tattooed And Twisted
description: Sataire and Volmere, too twisted for their enlightened Hollywood vampire clan, set up housekeeping only to have their gay welcoming committee take twisted to a whole new level. Their games of bondage would frighten the most jaded player, but when they meet their quirky gay neighbors, their lives are changed forever in a single night.Actor Clay Young has the bejeezus scared out of him when he sees his friends become a meal for the dudes next door. He escapes, but doesn't get far before he's confronted by the most extraordinary, tattooed and pierced creature he could ever hope to top. A vampire!But once you've done a demon, the paranormal world loses its mystery... Gay / Dark Fantasy / Vampire / The Arts / BDSM / Paranormal / Exhibitionism / Public Places
author: Lee Avalone
